title: New foundry, free fonts
content:
Hey, everyone, I just assembled my fonts, some previously released on DeviantArt, some never before seen, on to their own website here: [http://www.exclamachine.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013223026/http:/www.exclamachine.com/ "http://www.exclamachine.com")

There are 9 original fonts now, from handwriting-style to ornate to weird and I'll be adding more this summer and fall, along with refinements to the site and more extras.
author: Choz Cunningham
